Berserk:



Berserk leapt into the air, flipping, avoiding the blast as much as 
he could. He leapt down on Apocolypse, smashing his feet on him with 
his heavy weight.

He immediately jumped off, towards Dark Mouse. His claws brought 
traction on his landing. He went to grab for her. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::DarkMouse::
> 
> She kept firing on Berserk. "Apocalypse. I got this one. I don't 
need 
> your help on this." She was in the mood for a fight and this was 
oing 
> to be interesting for her. The autoguns kept firing stun rays at 
> Beserk.
